data.thought: S54|H|S53|Architectural Pattern: 'Notebook Composition'. Notebooks as composable units. Pattern: notebook A imports notebook B as dependency. B's cells become callable functions in A. Observable: composition graph, execution flow across notebooks. Enables: (1) Reusable reasoning patterns (2) Library of notebook primitives (3) Higher-order notebooks that orchestrate others. Like npm for notebooks. Technical: extend .src.md with import syntax, resolve at runtime.
